text: ABORT ALGORITHM First write an record to log for the txn. Then play back the txn's updates in reverse order. For each update record: — Write a entry to the log. — Restore old value. At end, write a log record. Notice: CLRs never need to be undone. >. | EZCMU-DB 4 4 D PI o) 3657/1:18:06 - ABORT ALGORITHM > [c c MIRE « 20l I i | m - 21- ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
